code: import i18next from'i18next';import{initReactI18next}from'react-i18next';import XHR from'i18next-xhr-backend';import LanguageDetector from'i18next-browser-languagedetector';i18next.use(XHR).use(LanguageDetector).use(initReactI18next).init({backend:{loadPath:"./locales/{{lng}}.json"},react:{useSuspense:true},fallbackLng:'en',preload:['en'],keySeparator:false,interpolation:{escapeValue:false}});export default i18next;
